data.title: Marie Prevost
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Marie Prevost on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 100% The Racket (1928)

Lowest Rated: 57% The Beautiful and Damned (1922)

Birthday: Nov 8, 1898

Birthplace: Sarnia, Ontario, Canada

A vivacious, charming leading lady of the silent era, Marie Prevost is, fortunately, remembered for her work in several sparkling Ernst Lubitsch comedies of the 1920s and, unfortunately, also remembered for the grim (if often misrepresented) circumstances of her tragic early demise.

Highest rated movies

100% The Racket

100% The Marriage Circle

89% Three Women

80% Hands Across the Table

57% The Beautiful and Damned
